arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog: Bologna vs. Genoa and Milan vs. Monza
Serie A: Bologna vs. Genoa – Probable line-ups and where to watch on TV
arts.sum: Coppa Italia winners Bologna will host Genoa at the Dall’Ara in their final Serie A...

Genoa are the team that have scored the fewest goals from outside the box in Serie A this season with their sole goal from distance coming against Bologna in the reverse fixture through Andrea Pinamonti. Bologna have not won at home against Genoa in the top-flight since February 2018, having won just three points and suffered two defeats in the five matches since; the Emilian team only currently have a longer winless streak at home in Serie A only against Napoli (6) and Juventus (22).

arts.ttl: Bologna vs Genoa Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Bologna, sitting in seventh place, host Genoa, who are currently in 13th, in their Serie A match at the Stadio Renato Dall'Ara on Saturday, May 24th, with kick-off scheduled for 17:00 GMT. Both teams ...
